pkgmetadata.longdescription: Asciidoctor PDF is a native PDF converter for AsciiDoc that serves the pdf backend. It bypasses the step of generating an intermediary format such as DocBook, Apache FO, or LaTeX in order to produce PDF. Instead, you use Asciidoctor PDF to convert your documents directly from AsciiDoc to PDF with Asciidoctor. The aim of this library is to take the pain out of creating PDF documents from AsciiDoc.
